original_title: Ein Geheimnis im Dorf - Schwester und Bruder
overview: Irene, the mayor of a Styrian community, also helps her mother and stepfather in their small department store and takes touching care of her 17-year-old brother. But when Paul Berger, an innovative cook, wants to take over the old village inn, wounds of the past break open and a dark secret slowly comes to light...
title: Ein Geheimnis im Dorf - Schwester und Bruder
